original_text: Now you want to fight against the Lord's own kingdom that he has chosen David's descendants to rule over. You have a very large army. You bring with you the gold statues of young bulls that Jeroboam made for you as your gods.
korean_text: 이제 너희가 또 다윗 자손의 손으로 다스리는 여호와의 나라를 대적하려 하는도다 너희는 큰 무리요 또 여로보암이 너희를 위하여 신으로 만든 금송아지들이 너희와 함께 있도다

sentences.original_text: Now you want to fight against the Lord's own kingdom
sentences.korean_translation: 이제 너희는 주의 나라와 싸우려 하고 있구나

sentences.original_text: that he has chosen David's descendants to rule over
You have a very large army
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 매우 큰 군대를 가지고 있다

sentences.original_text: You bring with you the gold statues of young bulls
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 어린 송아지들의 금 우상을 가져오고 있구나

sentences.original_text: that Jeroboam made for you as your gods
